Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students
Evidence Statements: The student can represent the problem of communicating over long distances in their drawing.
The student can include a string telephone in the drawing that connects two students, showing how sound can be used to communicate.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone sends or receives information over a distance.
The student can portray only the materials provided for creating the string telephone in their drawing.
The student can show how the string telephone helps people communicate over long distances.
The student can demonstrate the expected features of the device, like using sound to communicate, in their illustration.
